text: Lado a Lado (Side by Side) is a Brazilian telenovela. It is produced by Rede Globo. In November 2013, Lado a Lado won an International Emmy Award for best telenovela. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2012 television series debuts Category:Brazilian telenovelas Category:2010s Brazilian television series Category:2010s establishments in Brazil
title: Lado a Lado
